title: Sheriff Larrabee's Prisoner
description: The stranger rode up in the pouring rain to the lonely ranch house.  Before dawn he was riding quickly away.  Who had killed old Mr. Benton?  The stranger, or Gus, or Mrs. Zellar?  And why was Jack Montagne’s behavior so gentlemanly?  Read this 1921 pulp western to find out. Max Brand was one of many pseudonyms used by Frederick Schiller Faust (1892 – 1944), an American author known primarily for his thoughtful and literary Westerns. - Summary by david wales

sections.title: 1 - No Hang-out; 2 - The Hosts Of The House
3 - Larrabee Listens; 4 - Larrabee Wins His Bet
5 - Left In The Rain; 6 - All Aboard
7 - Public Opinion; 8 - Lavigne Learns A Lesson
9 - Unforeseen Succor; 10 - The Key To The Door; 11 - The Whole Story
